article.headline: (3) HOFSTRA 77, (2) SAINT JOSEPHS 75 (OT)
article.story:
PHILADELPHIA (Ticker) -- Given a chance at redemption, Aurimas 
Kieza came through in a big way for Hofstra.

Kieza made the go-ahead layup with 19 seconds remaining in
overtime as the third-seeded Pride escaped with a 77-75 triumph
over No. 2 Saint Joseph's in the second round of the National
Invitation Tournament.

Antoine Agudio scored 24 points and Loren Stokes added 22 for
Hofstra (26-6), which tied the school record for victories in a
season and will take on the winner of Old Dominion-Manhattan on
Wednesday.

Saint Joseph's (19-14) forced overtime with 5.2 seconds left in
regulation when Kieza fouled Abdulai Jalloh on a 3-pointer and
the sophomore made all three free throws.

The Hawks fell behind, 72-67, in the extra session before
rallying to take a 75-72 lead on a follow shot by Pat Calathes
with 1:18 to play.  But Stokes made it a one-point game with a
driving layup with 1:04 remaining and, after Agudio stole the
ball from Hawks senior Chet Stachitas, Kieza dropped in the
game-winning basket.

Jalloh led Saint Joseph's with 21 points but had his desperation
3-pointer hit the side of the backboard as the final buzzer
sounded.

Rob Ferguson scored 17 points and Stachitas 14 for the Hawks,
who fell just short of their fourth straight 20-win season under
coach Phil Martelli.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.
